availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Boone Moore (Franklin County, Kentucky clerk)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Annie M. Thomson on April 12, 1864. Employed as a clerk in Frankfort, kentucky in 1860. Employed as a farmer in Franklin County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 249
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Franklin County, KY, July 1863, p. 18, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clark County Marriages, Film #001943687, p. 63
Find A Grave, "William Boone Moore (1835-1899)," Memorial #44919277, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44919277 (accessed February 25, 2019).
